input.sentences: i was prepared for the 10k run .
i quickly went to registration and signed in ...
and | walked outside and received my number .
and | we were off to the races .
output.sentences: Here is my determined face as I get mentally prepared to run the race.
First we signed up in what seemed to be a ballroom.
Those of us who arrived early milled around a table set up at the starting point.
The starting point of the race was the Millennium Center.
The end of the race was easy to find because of the colorful flags and race staff in bright yellow shirts.
